Description.Text:
Property Location
In the heart of Moscow, Bagration is close to Cathedral of Christ the Savior and Moscow Kremlin. This hotel is within close proximity of Red Square.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 42 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Complimentary wireless Internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include phones with free local calls, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk and an elevator (lift). Planning an event in Moscow? This hotel has 570 square feet (53 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 14:00:00 Check-out time is 12:00:00
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

In the heart of Moscow, Bagration is close to Cathedral of Christ the Savior and Moscow Kremlin. This hotel is within close proximity of Red Square.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Moscow House of Photography - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Multimedia Art Museum - 0.2 km / 0.1 mi
Museum of History of Moscow - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Cathedral of Christ the Savior - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
NB Gallery - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Crimean Bridge - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Nikolay Roerich Museum - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Gallery of 19th and 20th Century European and American Art - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Peter the Great Monument - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Pushkin Museum of Fine Arts - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Ministry of Foreign Affairs - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Tolstoy Estate - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Central House of Artists - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Pushkin House Museum on Arbat - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Vakhtangova Theatre - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The preferred airport for Bagration is Moscow (SVO-Sheremetyevo) - 27.5 km / 17.1 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
